function.description:
Changes the value of a given cell to the provided formula. The `column` parameter can be either given as numbers or letters (e.g. "A", "AB"), the `row` have to be given as numbers.
Formulas can be given in the following form:
SUM(C4:E4)
Formulas are evaluated when the sheet is opened in a spreadsheet program.
